relationships.description: Hermione’s hand narrowly missed Harry’s glasses as it shot up again.
‘The Mandrakes we have here are still very young.’
Everyone take a pair of earmuffs,
They looked quite unremarkable to Harry , who didn’t have the slightest idea what Hermione meant by the ‘cry’ of the Mandrake.
